models.voiceCaptures: Brain dumps captured via voice. Each contains a transcript and AI-extracted items.
models.extractedItems: Structured items pulled from voice captures—wins, chores, events, ideas, etc.
models.captureSession: The current recording session with live waveform and status.
models.captureStats: Aggregate statistics about voice capture usage.

relationships: ExtractedItems can link to GoalAreas for categorization
CaptureSession becomes a VoiceCapture when saved

recentCaptures.transcript: Just finished my morning workout. Did 20 minutes of heavy dumbbells even though I was really tired. Also, I need to remember to call the plumber about that leak—it's been dripping for a week now. Oh, and Marcus texted about doing a nature walk this weekend, that sounds great.

extractedItems.text: Did 20 min heavy dumbbells even though I was tired
extractedItems.originalText: Did 20 minutes of heavy dumbbells even though I was really tired
call the plumber about that leak—it's been dripping for a week now
Marcus texted about doing a nature walk this weekend

recentCaptures.transcript: Good day overall. Had a really productive 1:1 with my director, talked about Q1 goals and team visibility. I let my team handle that incident today without stepping in to save them—that was hard but felt right. Built Legos with Ian for like an hour after dinner, my phone was in the other room the whole time. Tomorrow I want to be fully present at pickup.

extractedItems.text: Let my team handle the crisis without stepping in to 'save' them
extractedItems.originalText: I let my team handle that incident today without stepping in to save them

extractedItems.text: Built a Lego set with Ian, phone was in the other room the whole time
extractedItems.originalText: Built Legos with Ian for like an hour after dinner, my phone was in the other room the whole time

extractedItems.text: Be fully present with Ian at pickup today
extractedItems.originalText: Tomorrow I want to be fully present at pickup

recentCaptures.transcript: Just wrapped the quarterly strategy doc ahead of deadline! Feel good about that. Had an idea for a newsletter topic—something about how senior ICs can build visibility without being annoying about it. Need to schedule Ian's dentist appointment, his 6-month checkup is overdue.

extractedItems.text: Finished the quarterly strategy doc ahead of deadline
extractedItems.originalText: Just wrapped the quarterly strategy doc ahead of deadline

extractedItems.text: Newsletter: How senior ICs can build visibility without being annoying
extractedItems.originalText: something about how senior ICs can build visibility without being annoying about it
Need to schedule Ian's dentist appointment, his 6-month checkup is overdue

recentCaptures.transcript: Had a really good therapy session today, felt heard for once. Sarah mentioned wanting to do a real date night soon—no work talk allowed. I should look into that new restaurant downtown. Also thinking about whether we should get Ian into swimming lessons this spring.
